quotes.message: Faithless is he that says farewell when the road darkens.
quotes.name: J.R.R.Tolkien

quotes.message: How unreliable is the woman caught being faithful! Today she is faithful to you, tomorrow to another.
quotes.name: Karl Kraus

quotes.message: I have no faith in my faith. My faith is in the faithful God.
quotes.name: Leonard Ravenhill

quotes.message: When we in faith embrace Christ as our Lord and Savior, our minds are transformed.
quotes.name: John MacArthur Jr

quotes.message: Faith in the king comes easily in lovely times, but be faithful now and endure, pale lover.
quotes.name: Rumi

quotes.message: Leave me if you must, but be faithful to me if you are with me.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Edwards

quotes.message: Have confidence. Return. Invoke our Lady and you'll be faithful.
quotes.name: Josemaria Escriva

quotes.message: In all my life and in the future, I will always be a faithful and loyal servant to all of my compatriots.
quotes.name: Norodom Sihamoni

quotes.message: Be faithful to that which exists within yourself.
quotes.name: Andre Gide

quotes.message: If you be faithful, you will have that honor that comes from God: his Spirit will say in your hearts, Well done, good and faithful servants.
quotes.name: Adam Clarke

quotes.message: We are not here to be successful, we are here to be FAITHFUL.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: Otherwise without faith it becomes very difficult to keep pushing forward every day.
quotes.name: Darrin Wiggins

quotes.message: The best thing about love is the trust, the best thing about trust is honesty, and the best thing about honesty is faithfulness.
quotes.name: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.message: Faithfulness and loyalty is not an option in a relationship, it's a priority if it must work.
quotes.name: Anne Nwakama

quotes.message: We can only be faithful to what we remember, and we remember only what we have known.
quotes.name: Marcel Proust

quotes.message: If your man were the faithful type you wouldn't have to worry about other women. Realize that it's his job to be faithful to you.
quotes.name: Sonya Parker

quotes.message: You have to be faithful in little before you are entrusted with much.
quotes.name: Daniel Brown

quotes.message: If you wonder how long Ill be faithful. I'll be happy to tell you again. I'm gonna love you forever & ever, forever & ever amen.
quotes.name: Randy Travis

quotes.message: Being faithful in the smallest things is the way to gain, maintain, and demonstrate the strength needed to accomplish something great.
quotes.name: Alex Harris

quotes.message: To love is to be faithful to those who cheat on us.
quotes.name: Nelson Rodrigues

quotes.message: Hold faithfulness and sincerity as first principles.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: One secret to my success is that I am faithful to my dreams and don't cheat on my dreams by taking drugs or blaming others when things don't go right.
quotes.name: Mark Kostabi

quotes.message: Become faithful to yourself, if you do, it will come natural towards everyone else.
quotes.name: Unarine Ramaru

quotes.message: God wants to be faithful and make sure that He restores me and you to our original purpose, a pure and holy people when He comes again.
quotes.name: Happy Zhou

quotes.message: We shouldn't have to be faithful, we should want to be faithful.
quotes.name: Larry Kramer

quotes.message: Dont worry about being effective. Just concentrate on being faithful to the truth.
quotes.name: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.message: Be faithful in small things because it is in them your strength lies.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: Faith is unseen but felt, faith is strength when we feel we have none, faith is hope when all seems lost.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: Only the person who has faith in himself is able to be faithful to others.
quotes.name: Erich Fromm

quotes.message: At times one remains faithful to a cause only because its opponents do not cease to be insipid.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: I don't think there are any men who are faithful to their wives.
quotes.name: Jackie Kennedy

quotes.message: It is a truism to say that the dog is largely what his master makes of him: he can be savage and dangerous, untrustworthy, cringing and fearful; or he can be faithful and loyal, courageous and the best of companions and allies.
quotes.name: Ranulph Fiennes

quotes.message: He who loveth a book will never want a faithful friend, a wholesome counsellor, a cheerful companion, or an effectual comforter.
quotes.name: Isaac Barrow
